article.title: Small Groups. Big Experiences... Worldwide!
article.lead: Globus and Cosmos Expand "Small-Group Discovery" Option On Europe & North America Tours for 2021
article.body:
When we explore the world, we share experiences with wayfarers from across the globe. When travelers choose Globus or Cosmos, they’re choosing to travel the globe with a small group of like-minded travelers: People who stick together from start-to-finish. Now more than ever, there’s great comfort – and extraordinary confidence – in that choice.

And, in 2021, Globus and Cosmos are making their group experiences even smaller with SMALL-GROUP DISCOVERY tours available – for the first time – on all itineraries* in North America and Europe. Both touring brands also offer Small-Group Discoveries on all departures through Central & South America, Asia, Africa and select departures in the South Pacific.



“With an average of just 24 guests per departure, in 2021, Small-Group Discovery vacations in Europe and North America are available on every tour. These special departures promise room to roam, while getting up-close and personal to fascinating places anywhere – and everywhere – worldwide,” said Steve Born, chief marketing officer for the Globus family of brands. “Whether they’re traversing the trails of Machu Picchu, taking a game-drive through Kenya, strolling under canopies of orange blossoms in Japan, standing in the shadow of ruins in Rome or enjoying the great outdoors in America’s National Parks, travelers will be in good company, thanks to our Small-Group Discoveries.”

And travelers are assured they will be in good hands on a Globus and Cosmos tour. When travelers choose a Globus or Cosmos tour, today and every day, they can say ‘goodbye’ to worry. “We provide our travelers peace-of-mind with the help and expertise of Tour Directors, local drivers and on-the-ground travel experts in destinations across the globe,” says Scott Nesbit chief executive officer of the Globus family of brands. “With help from our Global Health & Safety Team, we are also dedicated to providing travelers a safe, stress-free getaway. And in doing that, we leave them free to have fun: Enjoying off-the-beaten-path discoveries, engaging in customs and traditions and indulging in new cuisines.”

Deal alert! Book your 2021 Globus Europe or North America vacation by January 25, 2021 and save 10% off the land price!

For more information, please contact your preferred Travel Advisor.

To learn about Globus Health and Safety, please view the Travel With Confidence e-brochure.
